title: Error-Based Language Learning Simulation: Error Analysis and Strategy Development for Advanced Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic language structures and intermediate or higher language proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical language education aimed at improving global communication within organizations.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze language errors of others presented in VR simulations with 80% accuracy.
Learners can apply at least three self-correction strategies by error type (grammar, vocabulary, pronunciation) and utilize them in real-life conversations.
Learners can exchange error-based feedback in team-based projects and improve communication efficiency by 20%.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
